meta.notes: Pass #3 - OPTIMIZATION TEST: Increased physics filters (Quality/Confluence 70‚Üí75). Target: 35-40% WR, maintain R:R ‚â•2:1. Expecting fewer but higher quality trades.

physics_filters.reasoning: Pass #3 OPTIMIZATION - Increased from 70‚Üí75 to improve trade quality and win rate

time_filters.reasoning: Pass #1 & #2: No time filters to establish baseline

optimization_history.changes: Baseline test - MA 10/50 EMA, Physics filters ON (Q:70, C:70, avoid BEAR/LOW), Time filters OFF, SL:50 TP:100
optimization_history.result: BASELINE ESTABLISHED - Barely profitable but excellent R:R. 80% EA exits = responsive crossover system. Low WR suggests need for better trade filtering.
recommendations: Option 1: Increase physics filters (Quality/Confluence 75‚Üí80) for higher confidence trades
Option 2: Widen stops (75 pips) + TP (150 pips) to reduce whipsaw exits
Option 3: Slower fast MA (20 period) to reduce false signals
Option 4: Add time-of-day filters based on Pass #2 hourly analysis

optimization_history.changes: NONE - exact same parameters as Pass #1 (variance test)
optimization_history.result: VARIANCE TEST PASSED ‚úÖ - Trade count +0.7%, WR -0.2%, PF -0.8%, R:R -9.9%. All within acceptable ranges. System behavior is CONSISTENT and ROBUST.

variance_analysis.assessment: ACCEPTABLE - All variance metrics within thresholds (Trade ¬±15%, WR ¬±5%, R:R ¬±20%)

combined_baseline.conclusion: Low win rate (~31%) compensated by excellent R:R (>2:1). Barely profitable = needs win rate improvement OR wider stops. MA crossover system highly responsive (80%+ EA exits). Physics filters working but not aggressive enough.

recommendations: ‚úÖ READY FOR OPTIMIZATION - Baseline is robust across 2 passes
üéØ PRIMARY: Increase physics filters to 75 (Q/C from 70) - highest priority
üîÑ ALTERNATIVE: Widen stops to 75 pips + TP to 150 pips (maintain 2:1 R:R)
üê¢ CONSERVATIVE: Slow fast MA to period 20 (from 10) to reduce false signals
